snippet.title: PRISON OF HUSKS - Trailer
snippet.description:
Small trailer for a small game. Play here! https://hexosphere.itch.io/prison-of-husks

Assume the form of a doll and make your way out of this decrepit prison. Like a crossbreed between Sekiro and Demon's Souls.

This is the result of 8 months of solo development, with some assistance from my good friend archieb303 during the final month of development. This project was made to practice Level Design, Animations, Programming and Game Design.
